# uniqueIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for the service.

## Declaration

```swift
var uniqueIdentifier: UUID { get }
```

## Identifying the service

- **name**: The user specified name of the service.
- **updateName(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the name of the service to the specified string.

items.description: The user specified name of the service.
items.name: name

items.description: Updates the name of the service to the specified string.
items.name: updateName(_:completionHandler:)
